It's the retail version of Hitman Absolution. However, since it's a Steamworks game the content of the discs is encrypted with no way of unlocking it until Steam releases the decryption key at the time of release.

As of now, there's nothing more than some encrypted files and the installer which asks you to redeem the retail CD-key.

You'll have to wait for a crack until a group releases one. No one knows exactly when.

However, there won't be a crack for the game until it's been officially released by Steam, due to them being the one able to decrypt the encrypted files.

Only after that will the groups be able to work on a crack - when they have all the files needed.
